translations: abbr.设备管理控制与时间调度程序；Facilities Administration Control and Time Schedule

phrs.translation: 事实是不容改变的东西

sentences.sentence: The facts were plain to see.
He was armed with all the facts.
sentences.translation: 他备有所需的全部事实材料。

sentences.sentence: He read the salient facts quickly.
sentences.translation: 他迅速地阅读了那些最重要的事实。
